FW Revisions to NA Master Original Message From Dixon Billy D Sent Thursday November AM To Cc Byers Cameron Dewar Jim Fountain Tony Hann Steve Kneen Julianne M Kolb Fredrick T Marz Martin J Maundrell Richard C McClanahan Kenneth G McDermed Marguerite E Mellman Oliver Onstwedder JanPeter Ruitenschild Joanne J Shaw Lynn L Voinorosky Michelle L Werman David A Winkler Thomas Wong James Subject Revisions to NA Master Dear Carol Attached for your review are a redlined and clean version of the North American Master Netting Agreement based upon discussions yesterday Substantively the attached should be in final form I will forward to you and Marie Heard the Ex A in a short while Please note that there are two Enron entities in brackets because I am awaiting your assent to include them or an explanation as to whether such entities have been merged with other Enron entities already included Please call me after you have reviewed the attached Very truly yours BILLY Billy D Dixon Attorney BP America Inc Westlake Park Blvd Rm Houston Texas Direct Fax IMPORTANT THIS EMAIL AND ANY ATTACHMENTS HERETO ARE ATTORNEYCLIENT ANDOR ATTORNEY WORKPRODUCT PRIVILEGED AND CONFIDENTIAL If you have received this email in error do not under any circumstances read forward copy disseminate or save this email or any of its attachments If you have received this email in error take the following actions reply to this email indicating that you received this email in error and delete and completely erase this email and its attachments from your computer and any backup systems or Deleted Items folders BP Form NA Master Netting DOC RL NA MASTER DOC BP Form NA Master Netting DOC RL NA MASTER DOC
